effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate aWinning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove inning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your inning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,355, up to 11,776.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.1 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Use: Call in a ravenous ally and ride off into the sunset (or 15 yds, whichever is closest), inflicting 2 million Fire damage split between all enemies you ride through. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
